img_above_text:
![Wukong Bitter 45.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3e/Wukong_Bitter_45.jpg)
Head up the path toward a series of stone stairs, but be ready to deal with a new wolf enemy, the Wolf Guardian. Much like Wolf Assassins, they are highly mobile and can dart in and out of combat with their large sickles, but between you and your companion, he won't last long.
img_below_text:
As you head up the stone stairs, look for a small pathway on the left where Zhu Bajie will point out a small enclosure. Be ready to deal with both a Falcon Fan-Maker and Cyan Bat. Shut down the Falcon with Immobilize so you can quickly remove the bat, and then focus your attention on defeating the stronger falcon enemy.
With both of them down, you'll find that they were guarding a **Luojia Fragrant Vine** , which you can now bring back to the Zodiac Village instead of going all the way back to Chapter 1!

        - Following Text: "As you head up the stone stairs, look for a small pathway on the left where Zhu Bajie will point out a small enclosure. Be ready to deal with both a Falcon Fan-Maker and Cyan Bat. Shut down the Falcon with Immobilize so you can quickly remove the bat, and then focus your attention on defeating the stronger falcon enemy.
With both of them down, you'll find that they were guarding a **Luojia Fragrant Vine** , which you can now bring back to the Zodiac Village instead of going all the way back to Chapter 1!"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a snowy battlefield from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the protagonist engaging in combat against two enemies: a Falcon Fan-Maker (flying enemy on the right) and a Cyan Bat (highlighted with a red circle on the left). The preceding text introduces the Wolf Guardian encounter, while the following text describes the strategy for defeating these enemies and obtaining the **Luojia Fragrant Vine**, a collectible item. The image visually supports the guide's instructions for this specific combat scenario.
